majorTasks.name: Captain Phillips
majorTasks.task: Steal and equip the Captain's uniform and ID badge, then successfully depart the sub.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Captain Phillips

majorTasks.name: A Sinking Feeling
majorTasks.task:
Disable all the main floor pumps and the airlock, then find a way to scuttle the sub.
Escape.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: A Sinking Feeling

majorTasks.name: Darkness, Imprisoning Me
majorTasks.task: Disable at least 50% of the ships batteries. Cause a reactor meltdown and depart the sub... *With* the surplus stock of uranium.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Darkness, etc. etc.

majorTasks.name: Breaking Bad
majorTasks.task:
Cause the Security Officer to experience psychosis by injecting them with Methamphetamines.
Plant some drugs on them and escape via the diving bell.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task, Breaking Wheh!?

majorTasks.name: The Cask of Amontillado
majorTasks.task:
Handcuff another crew member inside a ballast tank, then successfully weld the hatch closed.
You win if they drown before they are discovered.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Cask of Armadillo

majorTasks.name: Houston We've Had A Problem
majorTasks.task: Cause an explosion that destroys the ship's oxygen generator and then successfully return to the station you left from.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Houston somethings fucky

majorTasks.name: MURMAIDER
majorTasks.task: Murder everyone in the crew in a unique fashion, then join the creatures beneath the sea.

majorTasks.name: World Disarmament Conference
majorTasks.task: Remove every (lethal) weapon from the sub, then handcuff everyone else.
majorTasks.tip: Stun and grab, then move cuffs to their inventory and click the bar above the item to equip it to them ;)

majorTasks.name: Interspacial Weapons Deals
majorTasks.task: Smuggle a shipment of at least 20 fuel rods from the sub to a station.
majorTasks.tip: I Don't know how to complete this task: Why is fuel a weapon deal?

minorTasks.name: Flame, Dear Flame...
minorTasks.task: Deconstruct all the fire extinguishers. They are evil, and must be destroyed.
minorTasks.tip: Nothing can come between us, dear flame.

minorTasks.name: Inhalant Abuse
minorTasks.task: Swap the oxygen tanks in the pressure suits for Acetylene.
minorTasks.tip: You need to put the suit on to swap the tanks.  Be quick!

minorTasks.name: Backup Plan
minorTasks.task:
Find a weapon.  Stash it in the loose vent in the prisoner cell.
Just in case...
minorTasks.tip:
You'll need a crowbar to get into the armory.
Also I literally don't know if this is possible yet - If you can't do it, just skip it.

minorTasks.name: Grab a Can of 'Splode!
minorTasks.task: Randomly swap welding torch tanks for Oxygen tanks.
minorTasks.tip: I recommend keeping your distance after that...

minorTasks.name: A Scanner, Darkly
minorTasks.task:
You need a fix... Bad. Get into the med bay and take as much opium or morphine as you can carry.
Find a quiet place to chase the dragon.
minorTasks.tip: Feigning an injury seems to be a good way to get those sweet, sweet drugs. Otherwise, we're gonna need a crowbar...

mischiefTasks.name: Honky Tonk
mischiefTasks.task:
Find the horn.  It should be around here somewhere...
Let it's magestic tones be the clarion call that summons the Deep Ones!
mischiefTasks.tip: Try in one of the ballast tanks. I think security threw it down there.

mischiefTasks.name: It's Five o'clock Somewhere
mischiefTasks.task:
You need a fuckin' beer.  But we're underwater, so... What's the next best thing?
Ethanol is grain alcohol, right..? Close enough.
mischiefTasks.tip: Doc keeps a few bottles in the medicine cabinet.

mischiefTasks.name: I want my Mummy
mischiefTasks.task: Bandage someone who doesn't need it. We gotta make this guy look like King Tut! They can thank you later.
mischiefTasks.tip:
Check wall supplies for bandages.
Select the target and press 'H', then drag the bandages to their body.

mischiefTasks.name: Tool Factory
mischiefTasks.task:
Deconstruct all the screwdrivers you can find.
If they needed them, they wouldn't leave them lying around, right?
mischiefTasks.tip: I think I saw a bunch of these in the engine room. Engines don't need screwdrivers! Idiots.

mischiefTasks.name: Pew Pew Pew!
mischiefTasks.task:
I love the smell of coilgun in the morning. Let's blow off some steam!
Empty a clip into the abyss. For no reason.
mischiefTasks.tip: 'I swear captain, I saw something move out there! Huh... It was there a minute ago...';)
